Uses of Package
io.permazen.schema

Packages that use io.permazen.schema
Package
Description
io.permazen
Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
io.permazen.cli
Components that support integrating Permazen into a Java Console Toolkit console.
io.permazen.cli.config
Classes for parsing command line flags in order to configure a Permazen command line interface (CLI) session.
io.permazen.core
Core classes for the Permazen Java persistence layer.
io.permazen.core.util
Permazen core API utility classes.
io.permazen.jsck
Classes associated with Jsck, the Permazen key/value database consistency checker.
io.permazen.schema
Classes for modeling Permazen Database schemas.
  • Classes in io.permazen.schema used by io.permazen
    Class
    Description
    SchemaId
    A unique identifier that corresponds to the structure and encoding of an individual SchemaItem component of a SchemaModel, or an entire SchemaModel.
    SchemaModel
    Models one Permazen Database schema version.

  • Classes in io.permazen.schema used by io.permazen.schema
    Class
    Description
    AbstractEnumSchemaField
    Superclass of SimpleSchemaField types involving EnumValues representing Enum types.
    CollectionSchemaField
    A collection field in one version of a SchemaObjectType.
    ComplexSchemaField
    A complex field in one version of a SchemaObjectType.
    CounterSchemaField
    A counter field in a SchemaObjectType.
    EnumArraySchemaField
    An enum array field (of one or more dimensions) in a SchemaObjectType.
    EnumSchemaField
    An enum field in a SchemaObjectType.
    ItemType
    The various types of items that constitute a SchemaModel.
    ListSchemaField
    A list field in one version of a SchemaObjectType.
    MapSchemaField
    A map field in one version of a SchemaObjectType.
    ReferenceSchemaField
    A reference field in a SchemaObjectType.
    SchemaCompositeIndex
    An index on two or more fields in a SchemaObjectType.
    SchemaField
    A field in a SchemaObjectType.
    SchemaFieldSwitch
    Visitor pattern interface for SchemaFields.
    SchemaId
    A unique identifier that corresponds to the structure and encoding of an individual SchemaItem component of a SchemaModel, or an entire SchemaModel.
    SchemaItem
    Support superclass for schema items that have names.
    SchemaModel
    Models one Permazen Database schema version.
    SchemaObjectType
    One object type in a SchemaModel.
    SetSchemaField
    A set field in one version of a SchemaObjectType.
    SimpleSchemaField
    A simple field in a SchemaObjectType.
